title: You need help with templates you little bitch?
description: These cmds load/create message templates. Templates allow you to keep a message stored on the server. Changes won't be applied to a template unless saved to the server.

fields.name: corn?templates
fields.value: Shows all saved templates with their name.

fields.name: corn?load [name]
fields.value: Loads a template from the server and makes it your current message.

fields.name: corn?save [name]
fields.value: Saves the current message as a template to the server with the given name. Spaces are allowed in the name. Saving a template with a name that already exists will overwrite that template.

fields.name: corn?delete [name]
fields.value: Deletes a template from the server with a given name.
